document_data.name: ''The Throne of Three Kings''
document_data.author: [[Delmur]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Throne of Three Kings''''' was a stage play penned by [[Delmur]] the Bold [[Bard]], in the early 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. {{quote|Lords and ladies, hear me now, as I unfold this splendid tale
Of love and murder, betrayal and heroes; it befalls in a kingdom
Splendid and near, that has not known, for many a year
The happy reign of chaos.|Gulkyn the Jester, the Opening}}
document_data.History: ''The Throne of Three Kings'' opened with a narration by the character named Gulkyn the [[Jester]]. It was was first performed in the {{YearlinkName|1412}}.
